你.definition: you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])

你情我願.definition: to both be willing; mutual consent

你我.definition: you and I; everyone; all of us (in society); we (people in general)

你死我活.definition: lit. you die, I live (idiom); irreconcilable adversaries; two parties cannot coexist

你爭我奪.definition: lit. you fight, I snatch (idiom); to compete fiercely offering no quarter; fierce rivalry; tug-of-war

你看著辦吧.definition: You figure it out for yourself.; Do as you please.

你真行.definition: you're incredible (often an ironic expression of vexation, but can also express approbation)

你走你的陽關道，我過我的獨木橋.pinyin: ni3 zou3 ni3 de5 Yang2 guan1 Dao4 , wo3 guo4 wo3 de5 du2 mu4 qiao2
你走你的陽關道，我過我的獨木橋.definition: lit. you hit the high road, I'll cross the log bridge (idiom); fig. you go your way, I'll go mine; you do it your way, I'll do it mine

你追我趕.definition: friendly one-upmanship; to try to emulate
